column1: * 1932 - Author and interviewer Jan Broberg is born.
* 1956 - The fourth episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings airs on the BBC Third Programme.
* 1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to William McCullam.
* 1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Jane Dixon.
* 1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Miss Jaworski.
* 1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Christine Jones.
* 2013 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is released.
